channel.title: Wedding Photo Hangover Blog
channel.description: Latest blog posts from Wedding Photo Hangover

item.title: Ep. #001 - What Should You Do When You're First Engaged?
item.description: In the pilot episode of Wedded, hosts Jennifer and Steven Van Elk briefly introduce themselves and then talk about what you should do when you first get engaged.
item.content:encoded:
In the pilot episode of Wedded, hosts Jennifer and Steven Van Elk briefly introduce themselves and then talk about what you should do when you first get engaged.

item.title: Ep. #002 - Finding Your Vendors
item.description: In this episode, Jenn and Steve talk about how to find and choose your vendors for your wedding!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Ep. #003 - Vacations and Honeymoons
item.description: This episode is all about vacations and honeymoons.

item.title: Ep. #004 - Should You Hire a Planner or Coordinator for Your Wedding?
item.description: Jenn and Steve talk about the pros and cons of wedding planners and coordinators in this wedding. They also share some stories of times they've witnessed planners and coordinators saving the day.
item.content:encoded:
Jenn and Steve talk about the pros and cons of wedding planners and coordinators in this wedding. They also share some stories of times they've witnessed planners and coordinators saving the day.
